18819.「ここで プレシアンナが修行してるらしいわ。\n あたいね あれから 必死で修行:
I heard Prescianna is training here. I've been
training hard since then. Now, I'm as good as
Prescianna.

18820.「プレシアンナと勝負して……勝ってみせる。\n 天才が どれほどのものか見てやる:
I will play Prescianna... and I will win.
We'll see how much of a genius you are!

18821.「……あとさ あの時 言えなかったから\n 今 言っとくね。:
I couldn't tell you at the time, so I'll tell
you now.

18822.「スターデビルと戦った時……。\n あの時は助けてくれて ありがと……。:
When we fought Star Devil... thank you for
saving my life...

18824.「プレシアンナを倒したら\n 次は あんたの番だからね。: If we beat Prescianna, you're next.

18825.「これが実力の差よ。もう いいかしら？\n まあ 死にたいのなら\n 徹底的に:
That's the difference between us. Is that
enough? Well, if you want to die, I can give
you a thorough beating.

18826.「うう……。これが 天才プレシアンナ……。\n まったく 歯が立たないなんて……:
Ugh... this is the genius Prescianna... I
can't believe I'm totally outclassed... I'm
beat... I'm beat... I'm beat...

18827.「あなたは チカラをムダに使いすぎよ。\n その身体じゃ もう一生 踊れないわね:
You are wasting your energy. You'll never be
able to dance again with that body. Well, I
don't mind.

18828.「あは<heart> <pc>。また会ったわね。\n あなたも モンスターゾーン:
Haha <heart> <pc>. Hello again. You
came here to reach the Shocking Twist, too,
didn't you?

18829.「でも 修行をこなしても\n あの究極の表現領域には 入れなかった……。\n そ:
But even with all my training, I could never
enter that Realm of Expression... could I?

18830.「あは<heart> あなたに いいこと教えてあげる<heart>: I'll tell you something good about you.

18831.「モンスターゾーンに到達するにはね…… \n あの修行をこなすだけでなく その名:
To reach the Shocking Twist... you not only have to have that discipline, but you also have to have a mind like a demon, as the name
implies.

18832.「やさしさ…いつくしみ…愛……。\n そんな感情を捨てて 相手を たたきのめし\:
Kindness... compassion... love... When you abandon such feelings, when you beat the hell out of your opponent and absorb his
abilities...

18833.「あたしたち スーパースターは\n 人の領域を超えることができる。:
We, superstars, can go beyond the realm of
human beings.

18837.「あなたの能力を いただくわ。: I'll take what you can do.

18838.「ああん……。来たわ……。\n これが モンスターゾーンなの？:
Oh my... here they come... is this the
Shocking Twist?

18839.「チ チカラが みなぎる……。\n こんな身体で ダンスしたら\n あたし どう:
I wonder what would happen to me if I danced
with a body like this <heart>.

18841.「あたしは ついに\n モンスターゾーンに 到達できたのよ。\n あなたの能力は:
I finally made it to the Shocking Twist. Your
abilities became part of it...

18842.「ゴミでも役に立てたんだし 満足でしょ？:
Aren't you happy to have been useful even if
you're rubbish?

18843.「あは<heart> <pc>。\n あたしは 究極のダンスをマスターするわ。:
A-ha <heart> <pc>. I will master the
ultimate dance.

18844.「マスターしたら あなたに見せてあげる<heart>\n その時は ふたりで楽し:
When I master it, I will show it to you<heart>
Then we can enjoy it together.

18848.「ああ……。なんてことなの……。\n あたしが止めていたら こんなことには……。:
Oh my God... if I had stopped him, none of
this would have happened...

18851.「こ…れで 終…わりな…んて……。\n あたい…もっ…と 踊りた…い……。:
I've been waiting... for this... and I've
been... dancing... with you... all night. I
want... to...

18852.「まさか……完全に 意識を失っている状態で\n しゃべるなんて……。\n よっぽ:
I can't believe... that you could speak while
completely unconscious... you must have been
so frustrated...

18853.「ま…まさか そのオーラは……。: I don't think so... that aura...

18854.「あなたも 到達しつつあるのかしら……。\n 究極の表現領域 モンスターゾーンに:
I wonder if you, too, are reaching the Realm
of Expression, the Shocking Twist.

18856.「あと少し！ あと少しよ！\n もうすぐ モンスターゾーンに入れるわ！:
We're almost there! We're almost there! We're
almost to the Shocking Twist!

18857.「最後の手助けは おばちゃんに させて！\n 後で メギストリスの酒場に来てちょ:
Let my auntie help you with that last bit!
Come to the tavern in Megistris later!

18858.「クリスレイは 自宅で治療を受けているわ。\n あのコは すっかり感情を失ってし:
Christley is being treated at home. She has
completely lost her emotions.

18859.「相手の能力を吸収し 人の心を捨てることで\n プレシアンナは モンスターゾーン:
By absorbing his opponent's abilities and
abandoning his human mind, Prescianna reached
the Shocking Twist.

18860.「……あなたは どうしてかしら？\n もしかして ひどい目にあった先輩を見て\n:
I wonder why you are doing this? Maybe you saw
your senpai who had a bad experience and your
anger awakened your hidden ability.

18861.「……あなたの その怒りは まちがってないわ。\n 正しさを貫くためにはね 心を:
Your anger is not misplaced. I think there are
times when you have to fight like hell to do
what's right.

18862.「<pc>。怒りを おさえることないわ。\n 今こそ 感情を爆発させる時よ。:
<pc>. Don't hold back your anger. Now
is the time to let your emotions out.

18863.「プレシアンナを止められるのは……。\n あなたしか いないわ。: You are the only one who can stop Prescianna.

18865.「それこそが 真のモンスターゾーンだわ！\n ついに やったわね！:
That's the true Shocking Twist! You finally
did it!

18866.「モンスターゾーンは 究極の表現領域。\n 自分の弟子が そこに到達する瞬間に\:
Shocking Twist is the Realm of Expression. To witness the moment when one's own apprentice reaches it... well, you live long enough,
don't you?

18867.「それこそが 真のモンスターゾーンだわ！\n <pc>。ついに やったわね。\n:
Now that's what I call a true Shocking Twist!
<pc>. You finally did it. This is a
present from Auntie.

18868.「同じモンスターゾーンに到達した あなたなら\n プレシアンナの暴走を 止められ:
Now that you've reached the same Shocking
Twist, you can stop Prescianna from running
amok.

18869.「プレシアンナの行方には 心当たりがあるの。\n ……もし 追いかける気に なっ:
I have an idea where Prescianna might be. If
you decide to go after her, you'll have to
come back here.
